about_the_game: The game demo consists of 6 chapters. The story begins with Subject Number19 finding himself in a labyrinth. The player is given a limited number of bullets and must find a way out of the labyrinth. Along the way, zombies appear. Zombies take significant damage to the head and die. Sometimes it takes one shot, two shots, or even three shots to kill them. The game is challenging and engaging. Escaping the labyrinth is not always easy. In this demo, I have provided a brief overview of the gameplay. I am working on developing the full version of the game. That's all for now.
